problems.title: Check If Number Is Even Or Odd
problems.description:
You are given a positive integer N. Your task is to determine whether N is even or odd.

Input Format:
A single integer N.

Output Format:
Print "EVEN" if N is even, otherwise print "ODD".
problems.examples:
Sample Input
4

Sample Output
EVEN

Sample Input
7

Sample Output
ODD
hintsList: An integer is even if n % 2 == 0, otherwise it's odd.
